about_the_game:
You've finally gained access to the world's most popular form of entertainment. Live up to the chance you've been given and complete the various courses as quickly as possible to make history. To do this, you'll have to perfect every move and every shot, making the most of every asset you've got.

There's no more rules when you aime for your ultimate goal: winning the title by beating the actual best score! It's your last chance to survive in this mad world...

Find your way through a series of challenging levels where you'll need to be precise in your movements to reach the end. Use your jumping and dashing skills, as well as your movement freezing gun, to your advantage, and don't fall off - it'll take you right back to where you started.

Good luck challenger!

There's no more rules when you aime for your ultimate goal: winning the title by beating the actual best score! It's your last chance to survive in this mad world...

Find your way through a series of challenging levels where you'll need to be precise in your movements to reach the end. Use your jumping and dashing skills, as well as your movement freezing gun, to your advantage, and don't fall off - it'll take you right back to where you started.

Good luck challenger!
name: The Gauntlet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Processeur 64 bits
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Super or RX 590 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 245 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Processeur 64 bits
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or RX 6600 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 245 MB available space

short_description: In The Gauntlet, you'll need to move fast and control your every move. Various obstacles stand in your way, and it's up to you to find the best way to get through them, taking advantage of your moves and your unique weapon that lets you freeze objects in place.
